name: Snow Demo (Touji)
description:
I completed the sprites for the first five Snow Mikus (2010-2014) so I decided to make a Snow Miku demo game. Play as Snow Miku and explore the area. There's not much else to do here besides that. You can add other Snow Mikus to your party, and leave them using beds.

Music provided by https://musmus.main.jp

I'm planning to make a full Snow Miku game because I love Snow Miku so much. I'm taking a rather big detour from the Vocaloid that I'm working on. Anyways, enjoy!
